casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Paul Dewayne CUMMINGS. No. 1A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of June 2006 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Paul Dewayne Cummings) shall have up to and including the 12th day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of June 2006."
